ygData.subject: Re: [archive-crawler] Writer Pool Process
ygData.msgSnippet: Have your writer subclass org.archive.crawler.framework.WriterPoolProcessor.  There are two examples that you can study: ARCWriter and WARCWriter. St.Ack

Have your writer subclass 
org.archive.crawler.framework.WriterPoolProcessor.  There are two 
examples that you can study: ARCWriter and WARCWriter.
St.Ack


Vaijanath N. Rao wrote:
>
> Hi All,
>
> I am trying to write an writer processor will will write the crawled
> data into SOLR/Lucene, I needed to know the steps to create a pool of
> such writer processor as in case of ARCWriterProcessorPool.
>
> Can you anyone guide me on this.
>
> --Thanks and Regards
> Vaijanath
>
>
